description.narrative: Output 2.4: By the end of 2021, the health, education and social welfare systems have stronger capacities for prevention, early detection, and response to child maltreatment in at least three provinces., which contributes to Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: By the end of 2021, disadvantaged children and adolescents have improved access to quality education and benefit from social services and judicial proceedings which promote their best interests

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls
Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse
Parent/caregiver education and programmes on violence, exploitation and abuse - across the life cycle
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.4: By the end of 2021, the health, education and social welfare systems have stronger capacities for prevention, early detection, and response to child maltreatment in at least three provinces.

description.narrative: Development of an evidence-based multi-sectoral policy note on prevention of child maltreatment, as well as a behavioural change communication strategy for prevention of child maltreatment through promotion of community engagement, were initiated. Systems to enhance MoHME's capacity for data collection, monitoring and evaluation of its prevention of child maltreatment programmes, were established. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/08/2020

title.narrative: Availability of a comprehensive report including findings of a) a situation analysis on child maltreatment b) a mapping of key stakeholders and existing systems/services for prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment in three target provinces.

actual.value: 2019:The Sit.An/mapping has been completed, and the report is available.

title.narrative: A draft strategy for national scale-up of the programme for prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment is developed.

actual.value: 2019:Technical discussion with relevant stakeholder on national scale up plan

title.narrative: A programme for prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment is developed and adopted by MoH and MoE for implementation in four priority provinces.

target.value: 2021:Yes ( Multi-stakeholder policy note on child maltreatment adopted by key stakeholders.)
